import React, { useRef } from 'react' import plane from "../../images/plane.png" export default function ResetPassword() { const LoginEmailRef = useRef(null); async function HandleResetPass(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(LoginEmailRef.current.value) const fetchResult = fetch(`http://localhost:8000/api/reset-password`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body:LoginEmailRef.current.value }) .then((Response)=>{ console.log(Response) return Response.json() }) } return ( <>

Forget Your Password?

Please enter your email address below to recieve your user and a new password.

) }
